title: Explain Rejected Tax Profiles
body: We've had our tax profiles rejected over and over again, without ever knowing what could be wrong. Clearly, "Your tax profile is not valid." is not much of a useful error message. Even our tax adviser finally had no idea how to deal with that. We had to go through Symantec tech support chat, Microsoft tech support chat, and finally Windows Store support chat who had to look up the error for a few days in order to finally get an idea what's wrong.
